subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador extended his commanding lead and a fellow Spaniard, Mikel Nieve, won the grueling 15th stage of the Giro d’Italia.
snippet: Alberto Contador extended his commanding lead and a fellow Spaniard, Mikel Nieve, won the grueling 15th stage of the Giro d’Italia.
